highlights: Engineered an asynchronous JMX-based workflow to migrate 150,000+ financial invoice records from SQL to MongoDB; utilized RabbitMQ with Dead Letter Queues (DLQ) to ensure 100% data consistency and transactional integrity.
Designed and implemented multiple high-performance REST APIs across microservices, utilizing Feign clients with automated security header injection for secure inter-service communication.
Led Root Cause Analysis (RCA) for critical production issues, implementing fixes that improved system stability and uptime for adtech financial operations.
Architected a Next.js host module using Module Federation to integrate disparate React and Knockout.js modules, improving frontend scalability and deployment speed.
Upgraded enterprise microservices to Java 17 and automated Jenkins pipelines for auto-branching and dependency locking, reducing manual deployment efforts by 40%.
Led the technical design of a cross-service reconciliation engine to handle invoice rejection and state reversion across multiple distributed databases.
